Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a game-changer that can significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $1000000. To make this opportunity accessible to you, we are offering the product at a special introductory price of $950000. We understand that such a significant investment requires careful consideration, and we are confident that once you experience the benefits, you will see the value aligns with our pricing. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your world. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
